sys_atf_step.description: Validate there is at least one record in 'rm_defect' matching query: Approval = Not Yet Requested and Assigned to = Matthew Shaw and Assignment group = Agile - The Whole Group and Calculation = Automatic and Closed by = Chase Waggenspack and Description = this is a renewal with 1 sku. He has the bundle added and the sku (which is not part of a persona). It will not submit for approval without adding a persona.These are the line items. The G3 Original on their account is not the G3 Unified which is part of the persona saved to Snow.JD - Yeah it's reading the Amount field on the price adjustment which is just the difference from the list price. Do we need a way to differentiate those?SS - Ummm I think so. Our catalog has all of the current pricing, whereas we have customers locked into the 'older' pricing. We need to be able to change it. and Escalation = Normal and Impact = 3 - Low and Percent complete = 100 and Phase type = Waterfall and Priority = 2 - High and Short description = Persona issues and State = Closed Complete and Status = Green and Task type = Defect and Created by = chase.waggenspack@summit7.us and Domain = (empty) and Domain Path = / and Upon approval = Proceed to Next Task and Upon reject = Cancel all future Tasks and Urgency = 3 - Low and Top task = {{Step 5: Submit a Form.Record}} With a failure timeout of 30 Seconds
